backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, customers, and quotes with CRUD operations, stock adjustments, and access‑controlled APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app with a root element and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuring authenticated routes, Internet Identity gating, and page components.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when authorization fails with a sign‑out action.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity sign‑in/out with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Full‑screen login UI initiating Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with navigation, user identity display, and footer, wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Renders a page header with title, optional description, and optional action elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing login state, identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs for roles, products, customers, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by configuring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/customers/CustomerDet: Displays detailed customer info, related quotes, and supports editing or deleting a customer.
frontend/src/pages/customers/CustomerFor: Dialog form for creating or editing a customer, managing local state and submitting via create/update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/customers/CustomersLi: Customer list with search, create dialog, and delete confirmation using query hooks and a table layout.
frontend/src/pages/inventory/InventoryIt: Product detail page showing item info, stock adjustment controls, and edit/delete dialogs.
Dialog form for creating or editing a product with fields for SKU, name, description, price, and quantity.
frontend/src/pages/inventory/InventoryLi: Inventory list page with search, create dialog, and delete confirmation displayed in a table of products.
frontend/src/pages/quotes/CreateQuotePag: Form page to create a new quote with customer selection, line item editing, totals calculation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/pages/quotes/QuoteDetailPag: Displays detailed information for a specific quote including customer data, line items, and totals.
frontend/src/pages/quotes/QuotesListPage: Lists all quotes with search, sorting, and navigation to create or view individual quotes.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, dates, datetimes, and converting bigint values to numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and managing URL and session-based parameters, including hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme settings, colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, existing features, and pending feature requests for an inventory, customers, and quotes web app. Includes metadata like schema version, project details, and requirement mappings.
